name: Sarah Thomas
subtitle: Christian Wedding
text: Professional, punctual, and absolutely talented! They traveled to our venue early in the morning and made me and my six bridesmaids look stunning. The makeup was elegant and perfect for our church wedding - not too heavy but absolutely camera-ready. Worth every penny!

name: Ayesha Rahman
subtitle: Muslim Wedding
text: The team at Revive understood exactly what I wanted for my nikah. They respected my hijab style and created a stunning look that honored my faith while making me feel absolutely beautiful. The makeup was flawless and lasted throughout the entire ceremony and reception. Highly recommended for Muslim brides!

name: Priya Menon
subtitle: Hindu Wedding
text: My dream bridal look came to life! The artists were so patient during the trial sessions and understood exactly what traditional Kerala Hindu bridal makeup should look like. The final result was beyond perfect - I felt like a queen! The makeup lasted the entire day through all the ceremonies. Thank you Revive!
